discussion.content:
A. Data backups are limited to weekly or monthly intervals.
The Data Export Service in Salesforce can be scheduled to run either on a weekly or monthly basis. Daily exports are not an option.

B. Metadata backups must be run via a separate process.
The Data Export Service only backs up data, not metadata. If you need to back up metadata (e.g., custom fields, object definitions), you must use a separate tool, like the Ant Migration Tool or Salesforce CLI, to export metadata.

choices.A: Data backups are limited to weekly or monthly intervals.
choices.C: Metadata backups are limited to sandbox refresh intervals.
choices.B: Metadata backups must be run via a separate process.
choices.D: Data export service should be run from a sandbox.

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks intends to protect data with backups by using the data export service.
Which two considerations should the administrator remember when scheduling the export? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A and B
No such option " Select the “Choose only one value” checkbox on the picklist field.

questions.question_text:
The administrator at Cloud Kicks has been asked to change the company’s Shoe Style field to prevent users from selecting more than one style on a record.
Which two steps should an administrator do to accomplish this? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Reactivate the appropriate Shoe Style values after the field type changes.
choices.C: Select the “Choose only one value” checkbox on the picklist field.
choices.A: Change the field type from a multi-select picklist field to a picklist field.
choices.B: Back-up the Shoe Style values in existing records.

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers has enabled Data Protection and Privacy for its org.
Which page layouts will have the Individual field available for tracking data privacy information?

Cloud Kicks wants users to only be able to choose Opportunity stage closed won if the Lead source has been selected.
How should the administrator accomplish this goal?

choices.D: Modify the Opportunity stage a dependent picklist to the Lead source field.
choices.C: Make Lead source a dependent picklist to the Opportunity stage field.
choices.A: Configure a validation rule requiring Lead source when the stage is set to closed won.
choices.B: Change the Opportunity stage field to read only on the page layout.

discussion.content:
A is correct

AND(
 ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"),
 ISBLANK(LeadSource)
)

Poorly phrased question

"limited access to child records" - for me this means it's a Lookup field and not a Master-detail.

questions.question_text:
An administrator needs to create a one-to-many relationship between two objects with limited access to child records.
What type of field should the administrator use?
